titles.title: We want to see Jesus lifted high

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We want to see
Jesus lifted high
a banner that
flies across this land
That all men might
see the truth and know
that He is the way to heaven

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
we want to see
We want to see
We want to see Jesus lifted high x2

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Step by step we're moving forward
little by little we're taking ground
Every prayer a powerful weapon
strongholds come tumbling down and down
